note_en: chinese proverb: To refuse toadmit one's mistake evenwhen it is obvious
variants_chs: 而「死鸡撑饭盖」就是指明知自己做错了，也仍要死撑下去，目的只是为了一个下台阶，可惜每次都会被人拆穿谎言。
variants_en: The idiom "a dead chicken trying to hold up a rice lid" means that even though you know you've done something wrong, you still stubbornly insist on doing it, just to save face. Unfortunately, your lies are always exposed.

variants_en: How to end this, how to smooth things over

note_chs: 动词：欺骗他人，这是最常见的用法，指通过说谎、隐瞒真相或误导他人来达到自己的目的，使对方蒙受损失。
note_en: v: Deceiving others: This is the most common usage, referring to achieving one's own goals by lying, concealing the truth, or misleading others, causing them to suffer losses.
variants_chs: 形容被骗，或者在骗人的时候可以使用
variants_en: This can be used to describe being deceived, or when deceiving others.

alias_zhh: 唔指；唔淨指；边止；何止；不止
note_chs: 动词：用于数量或范围超出，侧重递进关系
note_en: v: Used to indicate an excess in quantity or scope, emphasizing a progressive relationship.
variants_chs: 不止这么多；不只是这样，而且还那样
variants_en: Not just this much; not just this, but also that.

chs: 无论怎么说/不管怎么说/不管怎么样
note_chs: 连词：表示无论情况如何，结果都一样。它和“无论如何”意思相近
note_en: conj: Indicates that the outcome is the same regardless of the circumstances. It is similar in meaning to "no matter what".
variants_chs: 转折语气：可以用在句子的开头，表示接下來要说的內容，无论如何都會是如此。表示无可奈何：有時帶有无奈或无力感，说明即使换说法，情況也不會改变。強调结论不变：表示不管从哪个角度、用什么理由来说，最终的结果都是一样的。
variants_en: A contrastive tone: can be used at the beginning of a sentence to indicate that what follows will remain the same regardless. Expressing helplessness: sometimes carries a sense of resignation or powerlessness, indicating that even if the wording is changed, the situation will not change. Emphasizing an unchanging conclusion: indicating that no matter the angle or reasoning, the final result is the same.

alias_zhh: 點菜；點餐；點嘢；落單；寫嘢；嗌嘢

variants_en: This phrase is generally used to describe someone who is chasing a debtor but has mistaken the person for someone else and has attacked the wrong person.

note_chs: 用于询问到达某个地方的方法或路线

variants_en: Its basic usage is to ask "how" to get to a place, usually when traveling, asking for directions, or planning an itinerary.

note_chs: 一是用于武术比赛或競技，指點到即停止，不以伤人为目的。二是比喻说话或做事，只說到关键处就停下，不把事情全部说开。
note_en: First, it's used in martial arts competitions or contests to indicate when to stop after providing guidance, without intending to harm anyone. Second, it's used metaphorically to describe speaking or acting by stopping at the crucial point, without revealing the whole story.
variants_chs: 用法一：比试競技時的  。用法二：比喻说话的
variants_en: Usage 1: In competitions or contests   Usage 2: Metaphorically, in speech.

chs: 有何看法/有什么看法/有什么想法/怎么样/怎么看

variants_en:
Core function: Seeking advice.
Context: Suitable for everyday conversations, such as discussing plans or evaluating things.

variants_en: She regretted betraying her friends and exploiting them.

variants_chs: 一般是指对方或者自己，自己一般是事后的描述，对方的一般可以是进行中或者事后的描述，因为自己的话没时间解释
variants_en: Generally, this refers to either the other party or oneself. One's own account is usually a description afterward, while the other party's account can be either during or after the event, because there's no time to explain one's own account.

en: Give her a good beating/Give him a good beating
note_chs: 形容词：给她/他点颜色看看，揍一顿厉害的
note_en: adj: Show him/her what's what, give him/her a good beating.
variants_chs: 对对方十分愤怒，要报复对方，而且要出全力报复
variants_en: They were extremely angry with the other party and wanted to take revenge, and they wanted to do everything in their power to do so.

note_chs: 形容词：这里的可以理解为磨时间/磨精力去做一件事。
note_en: adj: This can be understood as wasting time/energy doing something.
variants_chs: 形容要完成，做完这件事需要的时间很久
variants_en: This describes something that needs a long time to complete.

note_chs: 动词：抛弃，放下某人或事或物
note_en: v: To abandon, to let go of someone, something, or a thing
variants_chs: 扔掉、捨棄明确目标的可用
variants_en: Discard or abandon available resources with clear objectives.

alias_zhh: 吉屎；膽生毛；沙膽；夠薑；未死過；死字唔識寫；作死；夠𦢊；夠pok；沙pok；有種；膽大包天
note_chs: 形容词：同为俚语，胆上长毛，形容人胆大包天，含贬义。
note_en: adj: Both are slang terms,"Hair growing on the gallbladder" is a derogatory expression describing someone who is extremely audacious.
variants_chs: 形容勇敢无畏的人；大胆的，有勇气
variants_en: Describing a brave and fearless person; bold and courageous.

note_chs: 动词：形容指点，指教一下某人
note_en: v: to point out or instruct someone
variants_chs: 有两种情况     1是点击或者按一下，2是指点提点
variants_en: There are two scenarios: 1) clicking or tapping, 2) pointing or prompting.

note_chs: 动词：特指带领受害人入局
note_en: v: Specifically refers to leading victims into a trap.
variants_chs: 特指一种骗人的行为
variants_en: Specifically refers to a deceptive act.

alias_zhh: 车大炮；呃鬼食道符；呃鬼啦你
chs: 当我是傻子/你当我好骗吗
en: to lie to a ghost to eat tofu
note_chs: 俗语：显而易见的，不会有人信的谎言
note_en: proverb: to deceive somebody using a poor excuse or lies that are easily seen through; lterally: to trick a ghost to eat bean curd
variants_chs: 特指一种骗人的行为，常在句子最后
variants_en: It specifically refers to a deceptive act, and is often placed at the end of a sentence.

alias_zhh: 推卸責任；搏懵；得過且過；
note_chs: 俚语：形容蒙混过关、得过且过，推卸责任
note_en: slang: to shirk responsibilities and muddle through
variants_chs: 通常与“唔多觉”连用，“侧侧膊唔多觉”表示某人对待某事得过且过，还假装不当一回事，暗讽其没担当还脸皮厚。
variants_en: It is often used in conjunction with "唔多觉". "侧侧膊唔多觉" means that someone is indifferent to something and pretends not to care. It is an veiled criticism of someone who is irresponsible and shameless.

alias_zhh: 蠢材；低能仔；大番薯；人頭豬腦；烚熟狗頭；柒頭；水鱼
note_chs: 形容词：指昧于人情世故，易受愚弄欺骗的人
note_en: adj: a blockhead; a dullard; a nitwit; a moron
variants_chs: 描述这个经常被骗的人，的一个称呼
variants_en: A nickname to describe this frequently scammed person

alias_zhh: 傻仔；傻鸠；傻佬；扑街仔；蒸生瓜；傻傻閪閪
chs: 傻叼/愚蠢的人/sb/傻屌/沙雕
note_chs: 形容词：通常用来骂女人的粗口、恶意辱骂；第二個字代表女性生殖器，这個詞可以不单单指对方有智力缺陷，也可以是对方面行为強烈不滿，但现在不单单指女性
note_en: adj: Usually used to insult women with vulgar language and malicious abuse; the second word represents female genitalia. This term can refer not only to intellectual disability but also to strong dissatisfaction with someone's behavior, but nowadays it is not limited to women.
variants_chs: 骂人用的，愚蠢的人，​有藐视的意思​，甚至可以表达憎恨，厌恶，由于粗俗、污辱和帶有攻击性的含义，多数用于言语的侵犯和攻击
variants_en: The word "foolish" carries connotations of contempt and can even express hatred and disgust. Due to its vulgarity, insult, and aggressive nature, it is mostly used in verbal attacks and assaults.

alias_zhh: 老襯；戆撚；俾人揾笨；契爷；揾笨柒；壽頭；揾笨；撚​樣

note_chs: 形容词：形容鳖有钱的傻瓜，容易上当受骗，轻易相信别人
note_en: adj: Describing a rich fool as someone easily deceived and readily trusting others.
variants_chs: 形容不醒目的人经常给人宰割
variants_en: Describing someone who is not perceptive and is often taken advantage of.

alias_zhh: 傻撚到哩；傻到冇朋友；傻到笑；傻度驚
note_chs: 形容词：不是一般的傻
note_en: adj: boneheaded,Not just stupid
variants_chs: 骂人用的，形容对方已经超越了人类对傻的理解
variants_en: To describe someone as having transcended human understanding of stupidity.

alias_zhh: 柒下柒下；戇直；戇居；戇居居；傻更更；傻傻更更；戇戇居居；傻傻地；懵盛盛；木契；霎赣
note_chs: 形容词：不该硬的时候硬，浪费精力；形容不应该出风头的偏要说自己多牛逼
note_en: adj: Being assertive when you shouldn't is a waste of energy; it describes someone who insists on showing off when they shouldn't.
variants_chs: 骂人用的，评论人的一种状态，别人在局外人评价当事人行为
variants_en: A state of mind for commentators，Others, as outsiders, evaluate the behavior of the parties involved.

alias_zhh: 碌葛；懵炳；腦入水；反应迟钝；一嚿雲；碌木；烏哩單刀；慢半拍；木嘴；薯头；薯仔；低低哋；傻傻哋

note_chs: 形容词：用来形容人又笨又迟钝，同時带有粗俗的意味
note_en: adj: It is used to describe someone as stupid and slow-witted, and also carries a vulgar connotation.
variants_chs: 骂人用的，反应慢，描述一个人脑子转的慢可用
variants_en: Used as an insult, to describe someone as slow-witted or having a slow mind.

alias_zhh: 发神經；白痴；黐筋；黐孖筋；忽忽哋；腎腎哋；
note_chs: 形容词：最初指电话线路因短路（电线纠缠在一起）而失灵的現象，后來引申为形容人言行异常、神经失常或荒谬
note_en: adj: Originally referring to a telephone line malfunctioning due to a short circuit (the wires getting tangled), it later came to describe someone's abnormal behavior, mental instability, or absurdity.
variants_chs: 用来形容人说话或行为或事件怪异、不正常，帶有调侃或指责的意味
variants_en: Used to describe someone's speech, behavior, or events as strange or abnormal, often with a sarcastic or accusatory tone.

alias_zhh: 蠢材；笨柒；笨撚柒；大番薯；人頭豬腦；豬頭炳；茂利
note_chs: 形容词：极度愚蠢或迟钝
note_en: adj: Extremely stupid or slow-witted
variants_chs: 用于责备或斥责
variants_en: Used to blame or reprimand

alias_zhh: 反骨仔；二五仔；懵仔；茂利；柒頭；扑街；柒頭皮；柒頭；柒柒哋

note_chs: 名词：指摔倒在街上、死在路边无人收尸，常用于骂人，指明男性
note_en: n: Refers to someone falling down in the street and dying on the roadside, with no one to claim their body; often used as an insult, specifically referring to a male.
variants_chs: 它的意思已经非常多样，可以表示倒霉、糟糕、失败，也可以用于自嘲，特指某人的称呼
variants_en: Its meaning has become quite diverse; it can mean unlucky, terrible, or a failure, and it can also be used self-deprecatingly, specifically referring to someone.

alias_zhh: 食屎；死你就去；大镬；趁地淋；屌閪；碌柒
note_chs: 形容词：形容人或者事很糟糕， 动词：辱骂别人，叫人去死
note_en: adj: describes a person or thing as terrible;    V: to insult someone, to tell someone to die.
variants_chs: 一般用于骂人，同时也可以形容事情的严重性
variants_en: It is generally used as an insult, but it can also be used to describe the seriousness of a situation.

note_chs: 形容词：该硬的时候不硬，浪费机会；形容应该出风头时不出来
note_en: adj: Failing to stand up when you should has wasted an opportunity; describes someone who doesn't step up when they should be in the limelight.
variants_chs: 评论人的一种状态，别人在局外人评价当事人行为
variants_en: A state of mind for commentators，Others, as outsiders, evaluate the behavior of the parties involved.

chs: 讨人厌/讨厌鬼/神憎鬼厌
note_chs: 形容词：令人厌恶或憎恨的；令人作呕的；可怕的；糟糕的；令人愤慨的；字面意思：乞求人们憎恨
note_en: adj: loathed or hated by others; disgusting; terrible; awful; outrageous; literally: to beg people hate
variants_chs: 指某人或某事非常令人讨厌或惹人厌烦。
variants_en: It means that someone or something is very annoying or irritating.

note_chs: 形容词：表面意思是形容长得丑的人，可以形容事件出糗后，当事人的状态
note_en: adj: Literally, it describes someone who is ugly, but it can also describe the state of mind of someone who has embarrassed themselves in an embarrassing situation.
variants_chs: 当进行事件最终失败时可以用，形容倒霉，同时也形容相貌
variants_en: It can be used to describe bad luck when an event ultimately fails, and it can also describe an appearance.

note_chs: 形容词：字面意思是没用的东西，同样可以形容人，一事无成
note_en: adj: Literally means useless, and can also describe a person who is incompetent.
variants_chs: 用来骂人算是最大的侮辱
variants_en: Using it to insult someone is the greatest insult.

note_chs: 动词：意思是“闭嘴”或“别说话”
note_en: v: meaning "to shut up" or "to stop talking".
variants_chs: 通常带有不满或轻视的语气，要求对方住嘴。
variants_en: It usually carries a tone of dissatisfaction or contempt, demanding that the other party shut up.

note_chs: 动词：意思是想和你激烈性交，常用的低俗脏话
note_en: v: meaning to want to have intense sexual intercourse with you; commonly used vulgar and obscene language.
variants_chs: 可以用来回应心中不想不忿，在你被人坑的时候，表达愤怒
variants_en: It can be used to respond to feelings of resentment or anger, and to express anger when you've been cheated.

alias_zhh: 屌你老味；問候你娘親；屌那星；屌你鹵味；屌那妈

variants_en: It's used as an insult, and is quite offensive, similar to cursing someone's ancestors.

variants_en: It's used as an insult, and is quite offensive, similar to cursing someone's ancestors.

variants_en: Without any chance to fight back, they were at the mercy of the enemy.

note_chs: 动词：抢夺财物，指使用暴力或威胁等手段非法夺取他人财物的犯罪行为
note_en: v: Robbery refers to the criminal act of illegally seizing another person's property by means of violence or threats.

variants_en: A serious infringement upon another person's property rights and personal safety, unlike theft, usually involves violence or threats.

note_chs: 名词：字面意思是干爹，现代被理解为有包养的成分
note_en: n: Literally meaning "godfather," but in modern usage it's understood to imply a form of financial support or being kept by a sugar daddy/sugar baby.
variants_chs: 一般指有钱男人包养一个或者多个女生或男生
variants_en: This generally refers to a wealthy man keeping one or more women or men as mistresses.

note_chs: 形容词：出大事了，粗俗特指严重性

variants_en: When encountering big trouble and sighing

note_en: Located in Huidong County, Huizhou City, Guangdong Province; Xun represents wind, bringing peace and good fortune.
variants_chs: 古时候苏东坡到了叫鸭寮的地方，而这里的地形像八卦，鸭寮就在八卦之上，而这里经常有微风吹就改名为巽寮湾
variants_en: In ancient times, Su Dongpo arrived at a place called Ya Liao, whose terrain resembled a Bagua (Eight Trigrams). Ya Liao was situated on top of the Bagua, and because a gentle breeze often blew through the area, it was renamed Xunliao Bay.
